illustrations.name: Ch 3, Pg 6 — Rival Introductions
illustrations.prompt: manga full page character introduction spread, three dramatic panels stacked vertically, ALL CHARACTERS FULLY HUMAN: TOP — blonde rich boy stepping out of a luxury SUV with entourage, faint translucent PEACOCK TAIL shadow on the wall behind him, arrogant smile, text: "DAIMON RICHWELL #1 Junior"; MIDDLE — stocky expressionless boy sitting alone in a corner, faint TURTLE SHELL shadow on the floor behind him, text: "KAI MORIMOTO #3 Junior"; BOTTOM — thin smiling boy leaning against a pillar watching everyone, faint SNAKE shadow coiling on the ground behind him, text: "LUCA SANTORI #5 Junior"; in the background corner, barely visible: a brown-skinned island boy with an old backpack and taped racket, NO text introduction — invisible, shōnen rival introduction page style, all boys are fully human, animal associations are background shadows only
illustrations.negative_prompt: animal ears, animal features, furry, anthro, bad anatomy, deformed hands, extra fingers, blurry, low quality, chibi, super deformed, western cartoon style
